subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Peppi Knows won the $100,000 Whirlaway Stakes on Saturday at Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens after the favorite Eightyfiveinafifty bolted through the outside rail on the first turn and unseated jockey Jorge Chavez.
snippet: Peppi Knows won the $100,000 Whirlaway Stakes on Saturday at Aqueduct Racetrack in Queens after the favorite Eightyfiveinafifty bolted through the outside rail on the first turn and unseated jockey Jorge Chavez.
